title: Booking Information
sub_title: Payment must be completed before expiry time.
note_step_1: Go to any convenience store having Payoo service and make payment with Payment Code
link_step_1: Click to search for convenience stores having Payoo service
note_step_2: Provide mobile phone number to finish payment process.
note_step_3: After a successful payment, please check notification sent by Go2Joy and your email to transaction details.
